subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The junior center Tomas Jasiulionis doubled his career high with 12 points, including his first 3-pointer as a collegian, and St. John’s held on for a 62-59 victory against Marist on Friday night in the opening round of the Holiday Festival at Madison Square Garden.
